title: 108_s1470
content: Financial Literacy and Education Coordinating Act of 2003 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to establish within the Office of Financial Education of the Department of the Treasury, the Financial Literacy and Education Coordinating Committee to: (1) coordinate Federal financial literacy and education efforts. (2) develop and implement a national strategy to promote basic financial literacy and education among all Americans. (3) reduce overlap and duplication in Federal financial literacy and education activities. (4) identify the most effective types of public sector financial literacy programs and techniques, as measured by improved consumer decision making. And (5) coordinate and promote financial literacy efforts at the State and local level, including partnerships among Federal, State, and local governments, nonprofit organizations, and private enterprises.
